briefdescription.para: Core function for the Q15 CFFT butterfly process.

parameterdescription.para: points to the in-place buffer of Q15 data type.
length of the FFT.
points to twiddle coefficient buffer.
twiddle coefficient modifier that supports different size FFTs with the same twiddle factor table.

memberdef.argsstring: (void *args)

memberdef.name: plp_cfft_q16s_rv32im

briefdescription.para: Quantized 16 bit complex fast fourier transform for RV32IM.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 16bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forward (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1) transform.
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q16 *S, int16_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t deciPoint)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q32 *S, int32_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t fracBits)
memberdef.name: plp_cfft_q32s_rv32im

briefdescription.para: Quantized 32-bit complex fast fourier transform for RV32IM.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 32bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift (input format Q(32-fracBits).fracBits)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q32 *S, int32_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t fracBits)

briefdescription.para: Quantized 32-bit complex fast fourier transform for XPULPV2.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 32bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift (input format Q(32-fracBits).fracBits)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_f32 *S, float32_t *pSrc, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag)
memberdef.name: plp_cfft_f32

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on complex input data.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_f32 *S, const float32_t *pSrc, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, const uint32_t nPE)
memberdef.name: plp_cfft_f32_parallel

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on complex input data (parallel version).

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
number of parallel processing units

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q16 *S, int16_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t deciPoint)

flag that selects forward (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1) transform.
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift

briefdescription.para: Glue code for quantized 16 bit complex fast fourier transform.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 16bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forward (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1) transform.
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift
Number of cores to use

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q32 *S, int32_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t fracBits)

briefdescription.para: Glue code for quantized 32-bit complex fast fourier transform.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 32bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift (input format Q(32-fracBits).fracBits)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_cfft_instance_q32 *S, int32_t *p1, uint8_t ifftFlag, uint8_t bitReverseFlag, uint32_t fracBits, uint32_t nPE)
memberdef.name: plp_cfft_q32_parallel

briefdescription.para: Quantized 32-bit complex fast fourier transform for XPULPV2.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the 32bit quantized CFFT structure
points to the complex data buffer of size 2*fftLen. Processing occurs in-place.
flag that selects forwart (ifftFlag=0) or inverse (ifftFlag=1)
flag that enables (bitReverseFlag=1) of disables (bitReverseFlag=0) bit reversal of output.
decimal point for right shift (input format Q(32-fracBits).fracBits)
Number of cores to use

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_instance_f32 *S, const Complex_type_f32 *pShift, const uint8_t orthoNorm, const float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, float32_t *__restrict__ pBuf, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst)
memberdef.name: plp_dct2_f32

briefdescription.para: Floating-point DCT on real input data. Implementation of John Makhoul's "A Fast Cosine Transform in One and Two Dimensions" 1980 IEEE paper.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure with FFTLength = DCTLength

points to twiddle coefficient table of 4*FFTLength, of which only the first quadrant of the complex unit circle is used. For example, if S contains twiddleCoef_rfft_32, pShift can be set to twiddleCoef_rfft_128.
points to the input buffer (real data) of size FFTLength.
points to buffer of size 2*FFTLength, used for computation.
points to output buffer (real data) of size FFTLength, may be the same as pSrc.

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_instance_f32 *S, const Complex_type_f32 *pShift, const uint8_t orthoNorm, const float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, const uint32_t nPE, float32_t *__restrict__ pBuf, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst)
memberdef.name: plp_dct2_f32_parallel

briefdescription.para: Floating-point DCT on real input data. Parallelised implementation of John Makhoul's "A Fast Cosine Transform in One and Two Dimensions" 1980 IEEE paper.

detaileddescription.para: Floating-point DCT on real input data. Implementation of John Makhoul's "A Fast Cosine Transform in One and Two Dimensions" 1980 IEEE paper.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure with FFTLength = DCTLength

points to twiddle coefficient table of 4*FFTLength, of which only the first quadrant of the complex unit circle is used. For example, if S contains twiddleCoef_rfft_32, pShift can be set to twiddleCoef_rfft_128.
points to the input buffer (real data) of size FFTLength.
points to buffer of size 2*FFTLength, used for computation.
points to output buffer (real data) of size FFTLength, may be the same as pSrc.

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_instance_f32 *S, const float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst)
memberdef.name: plp_rfft_f32

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the input buffer (real data)
points to the output buffer (complex data)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_instance_f32 *S, const float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, const uint32_t nPE, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst)
memberdef.name: plp_rfft_f32_parallel

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data (parallel version).

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the input buffer (real data)
number of parallel processing units
points to the output buffer (complex data)

points to the output buffer (complex data)

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_fast_instance_f32 *S, float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst, const uint32_t nPE)
memberdef.name: plp_rfftfast_f32_parallel

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data.

detaileddescription.para: Floating-point parallel FFT on real input data.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the input buffer (real data)
points to the output buffer (complex data)

detaileddescription.para: This module contains the code to perform FFT transforms.
